description.narrative: Programme Coordination, which contributes to Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 6:The country programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards within the priorities for affected populations in achieving results for children.

mailing-address.narrative: Gerief west [Manshiya] block # First District H Plots numbers 6/3

title.narrative: Sudan United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Programmes in Sudan (Communication for Development)
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Sudan 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative:
Improved performance of budget and partnership management, while ensuring that programme assurance activities were undertaken ensured that programmes were implemented in a timely manner while mitigating and managing programme risks. More staff and partners are aware of UNICEF policies and procedures for engagement with partners and programme assurance ensuring HACT compliance rates of 100 percent of planned audits, 93 percent of spot checks and 115 percent of programmatic visits.
The use of e-tools ensured better monitoring and management of implementing partners as Sudan graduated from the pilot phase of partnership management module and rolled it out to full implementation | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: The committee for integrated programming is in place, operational and meet on monthly bases
Key event bringing together partners has taken place
Number of implementing partners familiarized oriented with UNICEF CSG policy, code of conduct and PSEA
Number of staff oriented on CRC, gender, accountability framework and child safeguarding
Number of localities implementing conflict sensitivity principles and approaches
Total No. of Partners to be trained on HACT/CSO Procedure and financial Management capacity
Percentage of Outputs which are updated within office deadlines in the Results Assessment Module (RAM)
Number of Program Review Meetings held with partners per year at federal level State level
MoUs with defined stakeholders, especially universities/learning institutions/private sectors in place
Number of staff trained on the budget management and insight utilization.

target.value: 2019:at least 16 (1 per field office, 2 per section

actual.value: 2019:2 Vision Training/Orientation was provided to ten (10) newly recruited staff. On the job training for 3 staff members(2 PAs in KRT and one CFO )

title.narrative: Percentage of PCAs finalized in 45 days
